comment: Whenever you try to edit a photo, the image disappears. The screen goes completely black. How do you go about editing an image that is invisible? I have been very keen to update the app whenever a new version is released hoping that the bug would be resolved but to no avail. To make it worse my phone didn't come with the stock android photo viewer/editor. So this is the only editor available for me. Can you fix this bug please! How about image autorotation by device orientation?
key sentence: Try to edit a photo, and the image disappears, resulting in the screen going completely black.
the function of activity: An image editing tool with functions to search contacts, open menus, apply blur, remove parts, edit sky, switch tabs, cancel, save, adjust, add text, rotate, resize, adjust brightness, apply filters, undo, and redo.
